import{useEffect,useState,useRef}from'react';import'./Fourth.css';import{FourthDetail}from'./FourthDetail';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Fourth=()=>{const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);const sectionRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const currentSection=sectionRef.current;// خزن المرجع في متغير
const observer=new IntersectionObserver(_ref=>{let[entry]=_ref;if(entry.isIntersecting){setIsVisible(true);observer.unobserve(entry.target);}},{threshold:0.3});if(currentSection){observer.observe(currentSection);}return()=>{if(currentSection){observer.unobserve(currentSection);}};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fourth-container",ref:sectionRef,style:{backgroundImage:'url(../assets/jobs.jpg)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fourth-overlay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fourth-pattern"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fourth-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FourthDetail,{icon:"pi-check",counter:"8",title:"WORKS COMPLETED",startCounting:isVisible}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FourthDetail,{icon:"pi-book",counter:"2",title:"YEARS OF EXPERIENCE",startCounting:isVisible}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FourthDetail,{icon:"pi-users",counter:"7",title:"TOTAL CLIENTS",startCounting:isVisible})]})]});};
